Articles.Content:
Glad to be here on these forums, and looking forward to learning how to not have my space stations fall apart when I'm not looking.

Either that of get some anti-kraken lasers, at least...

Welcome! I've got to visit London someday.

Station Tips: Use the largest Docking port for stations, turn of ASAS to reduce wobble, and perhaps, you could consider adding a mod like the docking strut to reinforce sections. Also, if you make them to big and lag your system, it may become more usable.

And then, you will make awesome things!

Actually I do use these things and have made awesome stuff. But in the last week, I've been getting breakages everywhere, with ships and stations that worked perfectly before. So I'm back to basics now til the update and we shall see.
